person.persName: James G. Saffin (senator and judge, hamilton county, ohio)

body.p: Born in New York on December 16, 1802, James G. Saffin was a judge from in the 1840s and 1850s. He was also a member of the Ohio State Senate from 1858-1860. He died Feb. 9, 1879 in Cincinnati, OH.
